website_summaries.verdict: A popular mascara by CoverGirl that has earned many loyal customers who love the buildable formula that can take lashes from drab to fabulous with a few swipes.
pros: This thickening mascara adds volume to thin lashes, and makes them look full and defined
Doesn't have the tendency to clump on lashes and provides decent wear
Available in 4 classic colors: brown, black-brown, black, and very black
Sold in single or double packs
cons: A lot of mascara comes out of the tube when you remove the wand, so you may have to blot it before you apply it
Some users gripe that the product dries out in the tube fairly quickly

customer_reviews.title: new packaging, same product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen several people write in their review that they’ve been buying this mascara for years and the one they received from Amazon looks totally different - I had the same reaction when I received mine and was suspicious it was a fake. It turns out it’s simply Covergirl’s new branding. I checked their website (see photo) and this confirms it’s the real deal, just a new look! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: IL Collaco

customer_reviews.title: What gives?
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if this is the actual product. I have bought in lash blast for years and this shows up in a completely different packaging completely different font on the tube. The one with the details is the one I had before. I don’t know if this is just an Amazon thing, knowing that there’s been a lot of bad products coming through Amazon lately. The consistency of the mascara doesn’t even seem the same. Way too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Stop,  do not buy
customer_reviews.text: When they arrived it was already dry in the bottle it was old mascara. Gettin real tired of the BS American business is doing. It's criminal.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: BEST Mascara on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years now and it is hands down the best mascara that exists. It stays on all day and never needs to be re-applied. The brush is silicone/plastic/rubber (or something) which I think is what truly sets this apart. The mascara NEVER and I mean NEVER gets clumpy. The brush separates my lashes and evenly coats each one to make them look FULL and long. I also use the waterproof one when needed and it never comes off when swimming and works just as well to coat each lash. Not sure I will ever switch to another brand!
customer_reviews.author: JTHB

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for fine lashes
customer_reviews.text: This applies evenly and clump free, which is probably the reason for its popularity. It doesn't apply very much at once though, so if you want a heavier application, it will take a while and will start to dry as you apply (which I hate, as it ruins the smooth application). I suspect it's best for very fine lashes (where clumping and excess product is a common problem). My lashes are on the thicker side (the actual hairs are thick, although they're sparse in areas). For me, a wetter formula works better and faster to add drama. For this, I recommend Maybelline's Full and Soft, which is still my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: Product received seems to be a knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware - the mascara I received does NOT seem to be genuine. I’ve been buying this mascara for years and have never seen the packaging like this. Not even the packaging of the mascara itself matches. I wouldn’t risk the chance of putting this on my eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: As a natural blond wanting a more natural look, I've been on the search for an inexpensive true brown mascara, NOT black/brown. This is the best I've found in "drug store" mascara. I love it! It goes on smooth, stays on all day, and comes off easily when I want it to. The brush is a little weird, and I can't say I love it, but I like the mascara overall, so I just deal with it. I wouldn't say the volume is amazing on its own, but I always use a lash primer, which helps.
customer_reviews.author: Alisheba

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara, and, being a senior citizen, I’ve tried several, even a one from Thrive costing $24. It goes on well, and separates your lashes. No clumping. But, like all mascaras I’ve tried, it will flake if it's on too long. Update: I was sweating like crazy today, and had sweat pouring into my eyes. I had visions of myself with black streaks streaming down my cheeks. I got to a mirror and was astounded to see that I had no running whatsoever! And my lashes were still curled! No flaking, either, and I've had it on for over 36 hours! I am VERY pleased.
customer_reviews.author: handicapped shopperTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Volume not length, flakes - not a sub for Lancôme!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t hate this mascara but I bought it as a substitute for Lancôme Définicils which I heard it was comparable to, and it is not. It offers volume, but not length as with Lancôme (in my pic the eye on right is lashblast, left is Lancôme). Also by the end of the day this mascara starts flaking off and ends up all over your under eye area. Wouldn’t buy it again, but might use the rest of this tube under a more lengthening product.
customer_reviews.author: DanL15

customer_reviews.title: Lasts THREE DAYS!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara will last and last until you take it off without flaking! Waterproof? Oh yeah! Snorkel with it. Swim- no problem. This photo is after THREE DAYS. Seriously. I don’t do it all the time/ but I have many times worn it three day’s without touch up. A weekend glam campers dream!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor B

customer_reviews.title: I love the Very Black
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to mascara for years. I love the Very Black. It's easy to apply, although the first couple applications with a new tube can be a little cakey. It lasts all day. My favorite is the wand with the little orange spikes. It keeps my eyelashes separated, which is not easy since they are so long. My only complaint is it comes off easily when wet. Sometimes I forgot I have it on and will go swimming. I'll come out of the water with black streaks, but that's expected since it's not waterproof. Regardless, this is a great product and I'll be ordering it as long as they make it.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how much I love it. I have been buying Benefit mascara (which I love) for a few years. I’ve tried cheaper brands to try and save money but, have never been happy. But this one! It goes on great . You can build without clumping. It doesn’t smear all day. Today I took a nap and it wasn’t smeared or crumbled when I woke up. The only thing I can say negative is, I wish the end of the brush tapered to a point. It’s a little difficult to get the corners of the eye. But I still can. Definitely buying this from now on!
customer_reviews.author: The Warren’s

customer_reviews.title: A great surprisingly discovery!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would love such an inexpensive mascara!!!! I’ve been using Clinique for oh so many years... I’ve been wanting some thing that added a little more volume while still looking mostly natural. This fits the bill! I don’t wear much make up, just some Foundation, some blush, and of course my eyebrows! Mascara can be such a mess, and this is really awesome. I read the negative reviews, and maybe they just got a bad batch?? Works for me, and I even sent a pic of my eyelashes and the mascara bottle to my Bestie!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Wombacher

customer_reviews.title: YIKES TOTAL DISASTER
customer_reviews.text: AGAIN I KNOW YOU WON'T PUBLISH THIS REVIEW BUT.........BOUGHT THIS TO USE OVER THE PRIMER AND AM LEFT WITH A GIANT CLUMP OF TOTAL MESS - DOES NOT SEPARATE-GOES ON TOTALLY CLUMPY - FLAKES ALL OVER AND DOES NOT HOLD CURL - AGAIN AFTER TRYING TO CORRECT WITH LASH SEPARATER, SAFETY PINS, USED A NEW UN UNUSED WAND TO TRY TO BREAK UP THE GIANT MESS ETC I RAN OUT OF TIME AND HAD TO GO TO WORK WITH A DISASTER ON MY EYELIDS - IN THE GARBAGE IT GOES - ONE THING THO - KUDOS FOR COVER GIRL GOING CRUELTY FREE BUT THIS MASCARA IS NOT CRUELTY FREE TO MY EYELASHES
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara! I am somewhat of a mascara junkie, I'm always looking for a great new mascara. However I always come back to this one. I love the brush it has and the formula is never clumpy. Its a great value for the money. I compare it to expensive $20 and up mascaras. Only difference is I feel I run out of this product much faster than the expensive ones. Its cheap so its totally worth it,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Messy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had read rave reviews about this. Ever on the search for better mascara, I was excited to try this. First of all, I HATE shrink wrap packing. By the time it’s opened, I’m grumpy. Then I pull the mascara wand out of the tube, bringing about 5x as much glop out as needed. Trying to scrape some off helped, but still left BLOBS of product on the wand, and leaving the top a very used looking mess. But I gave it a good try. A few frustrating times. And am back on the hunt for a useable, neat and thick waterproof mascara. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara out there -- Department store or Drugstore!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the formulations, this one is by far the best. Of any department store brand, drugstore brand, I always come back to this one. It is a dark black, it goes on thick without clumping and provides a false-lash look with just 2 coats. Love it. I replace every 30-40 days to keep it fresh and healthy - as you should for any mascara!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara I have ever used!!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how this isnt 5 stars. I've even tried the mascara on amazon that has 15,000 reviews and I think this one is a million times better! I've tried tons of different mascara over the years, and this one always wins. It makes my lashes pop, voluminous, and looks incredible! It lasts all day and does not smudge. I get comments all the time on my lashes. I would recommend this product in a heartbeat! You dont have to spend a ton of money to get great lashes. Buy this mascara and you wont be dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: BEST MASCARA FOR DROPPY THIN LASHES
customer_reviews.text: My lashes have no curl (I have to use a eyelash curler), and they are thin and very droopy. After I curl my lashes good I then use this Covergirl Lash Blast Volume mascara and my lashes look AWESOME!!!! this is hands down the best cheap store bought mascara around. It dries quickly so not to smear and lasts all day. I bought the waterproof so it does take a little vaseline or mascara remover to get it off. I am in my 50's and have used mascara since I was a teen. I have used the expensive one's and cheap one's and i always come back to this mascara. I hope they never discontinue it.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarbear

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. I use the waterproof version. I'm Asian and have think straight lashes. Non waterproof doesn't dry fast enough and my lashes fall back down before drying. Some waterproof brands work well but is so hard to wash off with just soap and water. This brand is truly waterproof and not hard to wash off. Doesn't clump AT ALL and use 3 coats. Definitely provides volume for my no existent lashes.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I like an unpronounced mascara to define my lashes. This one does a good job, the waterproof version is better than the regular version for volume. The refund formula was thin and looked my a more barely there/natural mascara. This one isn’t heavy but pops a bit more and gets thicker with layering. I work outdoors in a pretty active job so in the summer waterproof is a must and this one does not smudge once it sets! The downside to that is it is tough to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez the Killer

customer_reviews.title: Really best waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The best for working out, sweat proof, sex proof. And I have tried a lot of drug store and prestige products. It doesn't do much for me in terms of volume but definitely for length and definition. I can wear this through intense MMA and jiu jitsu training (I sweat A LOT) and no racoon eyes or black specks. This is definitely my new daily go to. It does take a little more effort to remove but to me it is worth it and makes sense since it DOES NOT SMUDGE.
customer_reviews.author: Beth21TC

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend, this mascara transfers easily onto your lids.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not good as a stand alone product. For a quick make up look I only applied this mascara and did my eyebrows. However, I noticed the mascara transferred to my eyelid and I kept having to wipe it off throughout the day. I thought this was supposed to be waterproof. When I actually did try it on with full eye shadow on, I didn't notice a transfer. I do feel conscious of it smearing all day long though. For a peace of, I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chi & Pa

customer_reviews.title: Goes on well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara. I've tried a few different ones lately and have settled on this one. I had a great mascara, but it didn't last long, so I started the tedious process of looking. At first the product seemed messy until I realized that I just need to make sure there isn't any excess product on the tip of the wand. Otherwise, the wand is a nice size and easy to handle. The product builds well without clumping and doesn't irritate my sensitive eyes. And it's lasting longer than the one I was using.
customer_reviews.author: kbh

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried every mascara out there: Falsies, Better than Sex, Thrive, Lancôme, L’Oreal- every drug store option, etc. This is my favorite and the only one I use anymore. The brush is full and creates amazing coverage and curl. I use the waterproof on my lower lashes - my favorite part of the regular non-waterproof version is the fact that it will wear off if I fall asleep but it never leaves raccoon eyes or smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Q.

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality Issue
customer_reviews.text: I generally like this mascara, although I find it hard to remove. The biggest issue is this particular item seemed to either be very old or, possibly, a counterfeit. It went on chunky (literally). Could not even wear it. I’ve ordered since and it is ok. Not sure if it’s a supply chain issue or what. Out of the few makeup items I’ve purchased thru Prime (makeup I’ve used for some time), two have not met expectations.
customer_reviews.author: CEH

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I normally use a different product, however, this one was on sale, so I thought I’d try it. Definitely does not compete with my original product. It makes my lashes look like I have no mascara on at all. And it’s SUPER hard to get it all off. I had to use 2 wipes get all of it completely off. I know that it’s waterproof, but so is my original product, and it’s not nearly as hard to get all the way off.
customer_reviews.author: Jenks

customer_reviews.title: All you need for make up for a day at the beach~
customer_reviews.text: I'm blonde and in the summer, my eyelashes get really light. If I do not use something, I look weird, even at the beach. It IS waterproof. I snorkeled with this on, but i also use the full face masks that are out now. I had no irritation and I am normally sensitive to everything. I love that it was all I needed, No eyeliner was applied in the daytime. IF your going to be at the beach, this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been looking for a good waterproof mascara for my bottom lashes because I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a good waterproof mascara for my bottom lashes because I have very leaky watery eyes. So far this one has been alright. The wand is a bit silly, but if I wipe it off a bit first it’s fine. It seems to last a good long time and doesn’t smudge or run when my eyes start leaking. It’s not the best one I’ve ever used, but it beats the maybelline falsies waterproof I also tried. That one ended up all under my eyes in a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: kkTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Probably magic
customer_reviews.text: The mascara I wore the night I met my future husband... Not really. But the point is, this mascara is a miracle worker. It makes you lashes more than double in length and it really makes them pop. I would definitely base a religion around- er I mean reccomend this product to a friend, or enemy! Who doesn't want great lashes??
customer_reviews.author: Sarker H.

customer_reviews.title: sent me waterproof when i didn’t purchase that
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite but they sent me the waterproof and i’m allergic to something in it and didn’t notice it was the waterproof before using it because of the tiny writing that says it in one small spot. I want a new one sent !
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch...dont buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before (not from Amazon) and liked it, but this one I ordered has a very strong chemical smell and is super dry, very difficult to use. I don't even feel comfortable putting it on my eyes because of the smell. I'm not sure what the conditions it was stored in in the warehouse or for how long, but it is garbage. It is getting thrown away and I will not be buying these from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Baggins

customer_reviews.title: Love the brush
customer_reviews.text: I love the brush, but I also love that I can get this in brown-black, which I prefer for work. On the weekends, I use the blackest black. I think it defined my lashes (just average length and thickness) without being clumpy, even with several coats. And, it was cheaper than at my usual store. Came off easily with soap and water. bought an extra to keep in my desk at work.
customer_reviews.author: Genie73

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is not very expensive and it’s just amazing. Has to be my top favourite. Best waterproof mascara! I can spend all day in the ocean or swimming and at the end of the day it will still look amazing. I also love using it on hot summer days or when I go to the gym. To take it off easily I just use Vaseline and it will come right off. I tried using makeup remover but it takes more time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Reed

customer_reviews.title: Covergirl Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Read the blog of the Pioneer Woman who recommended this and said it was not a paid endorsement. Since she uses the product when filming her TV show thought I'd try it. First I love Cover Girl and have always used their Long and Lush Mascara, now Lashblast is my go too. I love water-based mascara as I like the no fuss removal. Last all day with no clumping. Wear contacts and no problem with flaking or smudging.
customer_reviews.author: DebbyS

customer_reviews.title: Okay mascara, nothing amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not smudge proof. My lash tech recommended this mascara, bought it to try it since I cant get my lashes done during this pandemic. Its an okay mascara. Wand is super thick, hard to get in the corners of your eye to get those small lashes without getting it on your skin. Does do anything spectacular to your lashes. Hasnt made mine look fuller, longer etc!
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Dries out fast but great volume and color
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara but they must have changed the formula because it does not last as long as it used to. It dries out really quick which is really disappointing. This has been my favorite mascara for years but thinking about changing do to them drying out fast. I tried 10 different ones of the same mascara in the past year and they all do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Great Waterproof/Smudge Proof Formula, but not Much Volume
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is okay by itself, but it is much better with a lash primer. I do like this mascara because of it’s waterproof, smudge proof staying power, but it didn’t bring much volume to my lashes. I use Urban Decay’s lash primer with it and it will give my lashes volume and stay proof power throughout my busy day as a teacher. The reason why I’m giving it 4 stars is because of the volume part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I personally like it, kind of smells like play doh
customer_reviews.text: Texture: On the drier side, lightweight and doesn't flake. Very buildable. Scent: I personally like it, kind of smells like play doh. Lift: Offers good lift since the formula is dry, keeps a curl all day. Volume: Buildable, moderate volume and one coat, and good volume at two coats. Endurance: Slight smudging, otherwise, mascara lasted all day. Color: Black Length: Doesn't focus on length but gives a modest boost to length. Overall: 4/5
customer_reviews.author: cassandra tu

customer_reviews.title: Move on to a different mascara or seller
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package this smelled horrible. I know that usually indicates it is expired but I gave it the benefit of the doubt that maybe I was being critical. Every stroke trying to apply this felt like nothing was going on. Eventually when it finally looked like mascara was on a gently swipe of a lash comb seemed to remove all of it. This is going in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: UserE

customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking I could throw away my old mascara but by the way this stuff kept flaking off my eyelashes you would think I still had on the old stuff. I like the color, it looks a lot more natural but it just keeps coming off my eyelashes in flakes. This usually happens to me anyway for the first couple of minutes the stuff hardens and excess mascara tends to break off but it doesn't stop coming off all day. I don't know maybe it was just mine but I am using covergirl mega lash from Target now and its working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hapi Customer

customer_reviews.title: less than impressed with this mascara despite raves from others
customer_reviews.text: After a photographer friend and two beauty bloggers recommended this mascara wholeheartedly, I thought I'd probably just love it. Wrong. I am so unimpressed. To be fair, I have never been too big on volume specific mascaras and look more for the lengthening and/or lifting varieties. I don't have the longest lashes, but I have tons of them. This mascara is easy to apply, nice and dark (very black color), and it doesn't irritate my eyes. But it does nothing to lengthen them or "wow" me in any way, and I did have some minor flaking issues with it too, so I can't go higher than three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Terrible mascara!!!!!!!!!! Smudges after a shower, does not come off easily if you apply more than 2 coats back to back. Definitely NOT waterproof. I've used many covergirl waterproof mascaras but they quit making my favorite so I got this. Don't waste your money if you're looking for waterproof. It still looks nice, but does NOT hold up. I have raccoon eyes in the morning if I sleep with it on.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wedding mascara!! Super waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap! This mascara is amazing. It’s both waterproof and smudge proof. I’m getting married and heard this was good for your wedding day tears so I tried dribbling water on my closed eye and then rubbing it around and this stuff stayed put! Yet it came off with a little face wash! I’m thoroughly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality, Probably a Little Overrated
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a 3.5 stars. It doesn't make my eyelashes stand out shockingly like it seems to for others, and it smudges preeetty easily. Unless I seriously bake on my underlids, I know some of that pesky smudge is going to get in the corner of my bottom lid. The good thing is when I try to rub THAT off, it doesn't come off. So... good? Sure. The best? Doubtful.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great Brown Mascara
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it being brown instead of black makes things very natural looking. If you are going for super minimal makeup definitely try this brown mascara, the first time I used it I didn’t even curl my eyelashes and you could still see the volume it provides, this is also very light weight which I love.
customer_reviews.author: DataSpot

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another serum for years and I feel like it has helped with the length of my lashes but they feel thin. This serum has not only helped keep the length but I feel like my lashes are so much thicker. I also feel like I do not lose as many lashes. Great product! I will for sure buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: drapercastle

customer_reviews.title: For the price - this is the best
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't flake until after you wash your face, and is easily removed. Doesn't smudge. Stays on. I wear it with contacts and don't have an issue with it. Makes my lashes look longer and thicker. If I get some on my skin, I just grab a Q tip and it wipes right off. No biggie. For this price point, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara gives you length and fullnesss,as if you were wearing fake lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have often admire lashes extension but never worn them for myself,, but honey this mascara take your lashes to another level you're think you're wearing lashes, I applied two coats leave it for 15 minutes then go back and apply another two and your lashes look so long and beautiful,,but honestly you don't even need that much but I like to see them very long
customer_reviews.author: carla j.

customer_reviews.title: I have used this mascara since high school and love it.  High school was 50 yrs ago!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mascara for years and love it. It is water proof, for real. I never need to reapply it. I can workout at the gym and then swim and it stays on. You just need a quick swipe with makeup remover pads and it comes off easily. It does clump a bit on application but use an eyebrow brush to declump it and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Corman

customer_reviews.title: New go to mascara.
customer_reviews.text: Started using this brand about 8 months ago. Doesn't smudge and I like the volume and that the brush helps spread out the lashes when applying. You can definitely tell when it starts getting old. It clumps and dries out. I have this on subscribe and save so it helps make sure I am not using an old tube. Lasts about 3 months for me.
customer_reviews.author: gamom

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading some reviews on lengthening mascara. I decided to choose this option first as it was one of the least expensive. It does a good job but I didn't get the kind of lengthening that was promised or that I expected. I'll give one of the more expensive brands a try for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Very short bristles
customer_reviews.text: The bristles start off pretty short, but taper to nothing for the last 1/4 inch of the wand. I use the end of the wand to put mascara on my bottom lashes - no bristles with which to do this. It is too late to return the item, but I am cancelling it off my Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding waterproof brown mascara in stores for under 10$. I have no real complaints with this brand and I am glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara I have ever tried, literally. None of the other ones have made my eyelashes fuller and this one had done it! The previous one I had did a very good job and I thought that was the best any of them can do, but this one really surprised me. And it doesn't leave them too thick so they don't look ugly at all! I'm so happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: vanessa cordero

customer_reviews.title: This COVERGIRL LashBlast Volume Waterproof mascara in Very Black is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, inexpensive and surprisingly impressive mascara. This COVERGIRL LashBlast Volume Waterproof mascara in Very Black is beautiful and really does stay in place all day. Make aure you have remover for it cause it'll work you trying to get off just in the shower. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Evin L. Joslin

customer_reviews.title: Flawless eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I have tried pretty much every drug store mascara and I am IN LOVE with this one. It makes my eyelashes look so long without building up or looking clumpy. I love how the brush separates the eyelashes to create a flawless, soft look. I honestly don’t think I’ll ever use any other mascara again!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke S.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst purchase. The applicator was so screwed up. The mascara is so sloppy itself. I will never buy any of this brand of mascara and I should have known better to buy mascara off Amazon. Everything is the same price as the grocery store or Walmart and then it's a factory knock off. It's disturbing to me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Nice mascara to give a little extra volume to a natural look
customer_reviews.text: I like the natural coverage and if you apply several layers, allowing each to dry, it really pops. Seems like it takes a bit to dry and i usually do my eyes first in the morning then the rest and before I leave the bathroom, many times just the blinking I do leaves a smudge under my eye that requires cleaning. Annoying but not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Glendora

customer_reviews.title: I love this mascara but the packaging was not intact
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara for holding a curl. It gives good volume as well and doesn’t flake or smudge on me. It’s waterproof so it takes some work to remove. I love the product, but my buying experience is the reason for the low rating. It was a very good price and came on time, but the packaging was taped closed because it had already been opened. I could not tell if the product had been used. I’m taking advantage of Amazon’s excellent return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more disappointed with this product. I don’t know if I received a faulty product or what but this is the worst mascara I’ve ever used. The second I started to apply it, it was gummy and would not go on evenly. I persisted but even once I got it to cover my lashes it then started to clump up. Not the best experience and I found the wand to be of a horrible design. I have naturally long and thick lashes but somehow this product made them seem short and clumped together. So now the tube of lash blast has now found a home in the trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mascara you’re looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and will continue to buy it over and over again. It is similar to the tarte brand mascara that retails for much more, in my opinion. My lashes have lift and volume and it only takes two coats for them to look fantastic. Also- When I was in high school theatre we had to wear fake lashes. I never liked the glue so I just used four or five coats of this and no one even noticed I wasn’t wearing fake lashes!
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite waterproof mascara. I have used this same brand for years now and I’m always satisfied. It covers my lashes well, doesn’t clump & lasts through humid weather & rain. The price is great and delivery is very prompt. I highly recommend you try this!
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGal

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is awesome! It is super lengthening(my eyelashes touch my eyebrows) and is one of the only mascaras to not flake on me. Usually by the end of the day there is always mascara under my eyes(which is partially my fault because I do tend to sleep in class lol), but this mascara is really waterproof and flake free. I also love the black-brown color; it's really nice for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mascara for everday wear
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mascara for years now. I have tried many other but always come back to this specific brand. - Price is on point - The bottle is shaped where it is comfortable to hold - The wand makes application effortless. The brush hits all lashes without having to go over them multiple times. - The mascara is not too dark, but dark enough. I will continue to keep this as a staple in my make-up routine!
customer_reviews.author: ShellyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not too wet - allows my lashes to curl a little.
customer_reviews.text: This sounds crazy, but I dislike mascara that is too wet. This dries a little faster, and it helps my straight lashes to curl a little. I have had 3, and I will order it again. I’ve learned that Amazon makeup is often cheaper as long as shipping is free.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage but really hard to remove!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews for this, I went ahead and made a purchase. I like the easy way it applied and made my eyelashes look more full and long. When I went to bed that night it was SO HARD to get off! I was actually washing more of it off in the shower the next morning. If you're looking for a mascara that STAYS, this is yours!
customer_reviews.author: cat_leg

customer_reviews.title: The best mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and this deal was a steal!! But this mascara is the most difficult thing to take off. It’s the only brand of mascara that lifts, gives volume to my eyelashes up so I live it with it!
customer_reviews.author: kim alban

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for light-haired or a more natural look
customer_reviews.text: I love this for reasons others might not: it’s a nice brown, hard to find, and it’s not thick. It gives a fairly natural look, with just enough oomph. I’m older I don’t want eyelashes that are super-thick or too black. It also doesn’t clump.
customer_reviews.author: Lk

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when they were 9.98 for a 2 pack and that was a good price but it has doubled in price to 18 buy again and I don't think I will at that price. It's great mascara that provides volume without looking clumpy. Its longlasting but easy to remove. My favorite mascara ive used in a long ime
customer_reviews.author: MrsOakes71

customer_reviews.title: FAKE - 100% not real
customer_reviews.text: Would not wash off! Stuck to my lashes like I have never had happen before! Would not wash off! I have used this brand for years. Also the cap and the container did not match in color. Lid was a different sheen as well. Sad to see this happen on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible!
customer_reviews.text: A clumpy, messy disaster! The applicator does not create enough traction to pull the mascara off the wand. Even after cleaning the wand with a paper towel there was still WAY too much product on the wand. I have no idea how any woman uses this successfully without getting spidery looking lashes. Straight to the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works great with clump crusher
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mascara for years with cover girl clump crusher ( the green one). I start with clump crusher and alternate with four coats total. It gives me long well defined thick lashes. This product did look alittle different but worked that same as what I usually buy. The down fall is at the end of s 12 hour shift some has flaked off.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna McNamara

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite mascara! I have tried more expensive "Sephora-type" brands, but I always come back to this. It thickens lashes, has good color, and stays very well. I have cried and swum with this mascara without it coming off--it is the most effective waterproof formula I have tried. If you keep it on for a very long amount of time, it begins to flake a bit, but nothing too bad! Even clumping is minimal, though sometimes you may want to comb through the lashes if you really build it up. My lashes are light and sparse, and this mascara makes me look very blessed. I love it, and will keep coming back!
customer_reviews.author: AD28

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have always like this product. It looses mascara quickly, so doesn't last very long, but it doesn't clump, so I do like the product and have been using it for years. Any others I order are clumpy and messy. The brush on this one is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Overall good.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara. I bought it in a brown because black is a little dark for my green eyes. It's nice and creamy. It doesn't smudge like another brand of waterproof mascara I have. I also doesn't flake off through out the day. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite is mascara in the world I've been using this since high school! Never will I ever use any other one no need to wear the fake lashes ladies with these! Can't beat the price on here so much cheaper than the drugstore I just order me one when I'm low oh well mine's dried out and boom!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Burnam

customer_reviews.title: Loyal product-user!
customer_reviews.text: My go-to mascara. I am an Ipsy subscriber so I often get mascara samples that I do try. Nothing beats this good ol' fashioned-drug-store-purchased mascara. It gets it right every time! It doesn't smear, it's easy to apply, and it's inexpensive. It even applies mascara and does not clump for me. I like that the shape of the wand, which I think helps the mascara be applied evenly. I've been a loyal user for years now and I don't plan on switching any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Surfing Mama

customer_reviews.title: Actually waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many waterproof mascaras from those available in drug stores to high priced brands found only in high end department and beauty stores. I can't even count the number of so-called "waterproof mascaras" that I either returned or thew away. I almost gave up trying to find a mascara that would work for me. I'm so glad I gave Covergirl Lash Blast Volume Waterproof mascara a try. It actually went on without clumping. NO SMUDGING OR RUNNING! Could not be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mester

customer_reviews.title: Go to mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I love using the better than sex mascara but I cannot afford to spend money on mascara like that all the time, this is my second pick always. I feel like it works nearly just aswell, I prefer to have volume not length which is what it does and the brush is great for minimal clumps!
customer_reviews.author: Beca

customer_reviews.title: Works less well than it used to..
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mascara for at least a decade. This year, I've thrown away and re-ordered a few times, figuring that I messed up my order or that I had a bad batch. Now I think I've run the test enough times to know that the product has changed. It was never perfectly waterproof, but now it's barely waterproof at all. By midday, even if I haven't worked out, it's all gone, turned into flakes and smudges. :>( Time to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: This mascra was so wet when applying
customer_reviews.text: It was so wet that when it got on my top eye lid I couldn't get it off. I would not use this and will be throwing it away. I love the original mascra and have been using it my entire adult life. Never again on the waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Gets better once it airs out
customer_reviews.text: Is sort of flaky and gets in my eyes which I don't like but for the most part it's ok. I like that it comes off easy when I wash my face. It seems to work better after it's been opened and used for a week or so, it's like the air makes it go in thicker which is what I like,it does have good volume and comes off easy, just don't like the flaky part
customer_reviews.author: ND Wool

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mascara years ago and I hesitated to buy it again only because I already had mascara and I never ran out (I worked in beauty retail for years) I saw this on amazon and decided to give it a go, I mean, why not?? I totally fell in love with it all over again. It coats EVERY single lash and gives such great volume. It adds length but not too much, but just enough. Easy to remove at night and gentle on lashes. This is definitely worth every single penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara in this price range
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not your most expensive mascara, but it's good quality in this price range. It last quite a while & it easily comes off with some remover - I use Vaseline to remove mine and it helps hydrate my eye area as well as remove my mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: Used mascara!!!
customer_reviews.text: The mascara itself is wonderful with is the reason i was purchasing this brand! Ive used it for years. Unfortunately the one i ordered was USED!!!! Im completely discusted!! You can clearly see where the package was cut around the top to get it out. And never have i purchaced this mascara and pulled the applicator out to be all black!!! Its ALWAYS orange the first time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I hate this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I hate this mascara. I musta have not noticed it was the waterproof formula. I love the regular lash blast mascara, but the waterproof is god awful. I wish I would have noticed it was the waterproof formula before I received it and opened it. Stick to regular lashblast and you'll love it. Waterproof is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Camper with Long Eyelashes  :)
customer_reviews.text: Really does give the appearance of longer eyelashes as mine are short. I have tried expensive and in this price realm. A makeup artist on the Today Show recommended it, thus I thought I would try it. I am pleased! I did get waterproof and it is a bit of a challenge to get off. But worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up very clumpy on my lashes. If you use this you really will need to apply super lightly and then do a couple coats or it will be very clumpy. I have used the purple (I think lashblast fusion) mascara of the same brand and really liked it, so I was pretty disappointed with this one. Planning to switch back to the other after this.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Bought LashBlast Waterproof Mascara because it was a Good Housekeeping top pick (2017 or 2018)
customer_reviews.text: Bought LashBlast Waterproof Mascara because it was a Good Housekeeping top pick (2017 or 2018). Regret. The applicator is terrible, and the mascara does not have lasting power. It smears from sweat/tears and flakes something awful. Clumpy, too. I'm going back to my tried and true, Loreal Voluminous Waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Blue_mtn_dd

customer_reviews.title: Ugh... Chunky, thick, unnatural BUT extremely water/wearproof.
customer_reviews.text: This was my go to for a long time over comparable priced brands. Since using luxury brands, there is no way I can go back to this. Chunky, chunky, chunky... made all of my eyelashes stick together despite application technique. I now lightly swipe on at base of lashes and apply my Estee Lauder over it to pull it through with my Estee Lauder application brush solely for it's waterproof effect. Does not smear or smudge. Is very difficult to remove. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: czechosicilian

customer_reviews.title: Currently my goto mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and would recommend to anyone who loves long eye lashes! However I’m not sure if it’s just because I used it quite a bit(I do my make up only once or twice a week) or what but it feels like it ran out quickly. Other then that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Better than drugstore.
customer_reviews.text: Not the BEST mascara, but I'd buy it again for the price. It definitely adds length and volume to your lashes. It is not as waterproof or smudgeproof as I was hoping, but it wears well for most of the day and is easy to minimize icky clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: THICKEN AND LENGTHEN LAHSES WELL
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good to thicken and extends my short eyelashes. You can layer it on to create an effect. Does not run during the day with the face greasing over as time goes on. Does not run even when I try to wash my face during the day (avoiding the lashes). Pretty impressed with this drug store brand. Beats some of the more expensive brand I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Eye4things

customer_reviews.title: Bad brush. Not quality.
customer_reviews.text: The brush inside came damaged. It made a mess every time I opened the tube. Maybe I received a dud. Threw it all away.
customer_reviews.author: Impoor

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but sometimes flakes. I will continue to buy it for the price & durability. It’s hard to find Waterproof mascara anymore, so I’ll stick with this.
customer_reviews.author: KimBar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, as always
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this brand for years. I've tried others depending on sales and free samples, but I always come back to this. It seems to work better for me than the expensive mascaras. Doesn't clump, lashes separate, doesn't rub off until I wash it off. I didn't want to drive to Walmart to buy more so it was super handy to have it delivered from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to for a low price. I am not a mascara snob so I can't say I have ever purchased any expensive mascara to compare this to, but overall, it is great. I actually love the fat tip on this one because you can apply really fast and go. A lot of days I just wear mascara so it is great to be able to apply quickly and get out the door. The color is good and it doesn't get clump, but excess does hang on the end of the wand, so you need to be a little careful with that.
customer_reviews.author: XanyaeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Product good, packaging absolutely outrageous
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, as always. My complaint is the packaging. Two small cards of mascara, sent in a box large enough to pack a pair of shoes in, and inside, yet another cardboard box, and balloon plastic. IT'S NOT OK TO USE PACKAGING LIKE THAT FOLKS!!!! Do you not read anything about wasting resources or their effect on climate change???????
customer_reviews.author: M. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof mascara
customer_reviews.text: The best long lasting mascara. I love that it uses the silicone applicator brush. Easy to apply and lasts all day for me. I've never had to retouch it unless I've been in a pool or taken a shower. Wipes off easily with waterproof makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

product_meta.title: Covergirl Lash Blast Volume Mascara, Very Black
product_meta.description:
Color:VERY BLACK| Size:Pack of 1| Style Name:REGULARGet that ultimate big-lash look with Covergirl Lash Blast Volume Mascara. This volume-boosting mascara instantly gives lashes ten times more volume than bare lashes. Pro-tip: Pair with Covergirl Perfect Point Plus Eyeliner for extra contrast that brings your eyes out even more.

BRAND STORY
By CoverGirl
feature_bullets: MAX OUT THOSE LASHES: Designed to max out every lash, Lash Blast Volume Mascara creates ten times more volume instantly
MEGA VOLUME IN AN INSTANT: Instant blast of fullness and length
PICK YOUR SHADE: Available in four different colors, so you can choose how bold you want to go
ZERO CLUMPS: This volumizing mascara evenly coats each lash with no clumping or flaking
CRUELTY-FREE: Covergirl products are Leaping Bunny Certified by Cruelty-Free International, meaning they are never tested on animals
